Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a very efficient and clean source of energy.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The planar design of SOFC requires sealant at the edges of the cell to prevent fuel leakage (H-2, CH4) and air mixing at its working temperature.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The glass and glass ceramics are most suitable and compatible sealing materials for planar design of SOFC.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the present study a series of SiO2-B2O3-MgO/SrO-A(2)O(3) (A = Y, La, Al) glasses of different compositions were prepared by taking appropriate proportion (mol%) of each oxide constituents followed by mixing and melting in alumina crucible at 1550 degrees C.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The molten glasses were quenched in air.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These samples were characterized by X-ray diffraction, Dilatometer and Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) techniques.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: FTIR study showed that absorption bands of all glass samples are composed of either silicate or borate chains.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The dilatometeric analysis was also done to find the thermal expansion coefficient (TEC), softening temperature and stability of the glass samples, respectively.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In order to understand the crystallization kinetics these samples were heat treated at 800 degrees C for various heat treatment durations.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The details of this study are presented in this paper.
Titulo: Studies on thermal and structural properties of glasses as sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
